name: Quick Dirty Trick

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Int 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Dirty Trick, base attack bonus +6.

sections.body: On your turn, you can perform a single dirty trick combat maneuver (Advanced Players Guide 320) in place of one of your melee attacks. You must choose the melee attack with the highest base attack bonus to make the dirty trick combat maneuver.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: A dirty trick combat maneuver is a standard action.
sections.name: Normal

description: You can perpetrate a dirty trick and deliver an attack before your opponent is the wiser.
